title: Pandemic-led tech adoption has shortened the techade by several years: Nasscom - Economic Times
content: Pandemic-led tech adoption has shortened the techade by several years: Nasscom  Economic Times
description: "The pandemic actually accelerated the tech adoption and therefore has shortened the decade by several years. And today technology has become indispensable to progress and is the single biggest driver of change,‚Äù Rekha Menon, chairperson of Nasscom said.
